name: Another Adventure
overview: We've all been here before...we love Adventure, but we want MORE... So, what is different about this new version of the beloved game of Adventure? Well, quite a bit! 1) Enhanced Graphics, including flippable redesigned dragons 2) A sword that changes directions with you as you move 3) The bat now resurrects dead dragons (better keep tabs on that sword!!!) in games 3 and 5.
